title: Inside the lab where Canadian Tire is developing thousands of new gadgets
summary: Canadian Tire is focused on expanding its private-label brand sales through a multi-pronged strategy that includes product development and innovation. The company is increasing the quality and range of its own brands, expanding into higher price points, and developing products that are unique to its stores. This strategy aims to boost sales and profits, increase customer loyalty, and compete effectively against major players like Amazon and Walmart.
